events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon when another vehicle collided with mine at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following the initial report mentioning a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has now been assigned to your case to assist with the vehicle damage claim and guide you through the process.
We officially acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and will begin processing it promptly.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and any repair estimates to support the investigation.
We have received all requested documentation including photos, police report, and repair quotes for your auto claim.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing all submitted evidence and details related to the vehicle collision.
The investigation into the auto accident has now been completed after thorough assessment of all facts.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage evaluation, and we await your response on the terms.
Thank you for your feedback; you have accepted the settlement offer and are satisfied with the proposed compensation.
The auto insurance claim has been officially approved, confirming coverage of repair costs as per policy terms.
Payment for the approved claim has been issued to your designated account to cover the vehicle repair expenses.
The claim has been successfully closed following the completion of payment and confirmation of repair work.
All documents and records related to your auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
